text: Oleksandr Shovkovskyi (born 2 January 1975) is a Ukrainian football player. He plays for Dynamo Kyiv and Ukraine national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Super Cup Total Apps Apps Apps
